text: Bù Đốp is a rural district in Bình Phước Province of the Southeast region of Vietnam, approximately 90 km north of Ho Chi Minh City, near the border with Cambodia. the district had a population of 51,597. The district covers an area of 378 km². The district capital lies at Thanh Bình. ==References== Category:Districts of Bình Phước Province
title: Bù Đốp District
